comments.body: This demo page could use an overflow dropdown menu button to toggle the adaptiveness on/off

I'd thought about including one. It doesn't really work for someone who's just toying with the gallery app, since to see it's effect you'd have to reconfigure the gallery with a different platform. There isn't a simple way to convey that to the user; they're unlikely to read directions.

diffHunk:

      alignment: const Alignment(0.0, -0.2),
      child: Row(
        mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
        children: <Widget>[
